segments.text: My attention is drawn to the other side of the kitchen, near the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a young boy, precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into what looks like a cookie jar, with another plate in his hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is clearly unstable; its legs are splayed, and it looks like it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how daring these children are being, right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is standing beside him, eagerly reaching up for a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet prize, completely oblivious to their own danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic secret cookie raid, a timeless childhood conspiracy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the way that stool is wobbling gives me a knot in my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls backward, hitting his head on the counter?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so close to getting those cookies, yet so close to a tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I suppose that's part of the thrill for them, the forbidden fruit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They really need to be more careful, or someone is going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
